resources.string:
How to play: 
 
 1. Press PLAY to begin. 
 2. Packets are coming down from top of the screen. 
 3. Now you have to swipe your phone on the left or right side to sent the packages on the right direction. 
 	 3.1. If the Package is signed with an arrow showing to right, swipe your Phone to the right direction. 
 	 3.2. If the Package is signed with an arrow showing to left, swipe your Phone to the left direction. 
 	 3.3. If the Package is damaged, don't swipe your Phone and let the package pass. 
 4. You can make 3 mistakes before the game gets ended.
